newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Three wounded in Bangladesh campus shooting - police.
newsitem.headline: Three wounded in Bangladesh campus shooting - police.

text.p: At least three people were wounded by gunshots during an exchange of fire at Bangladesh's Dhaka University on Saturday between rival student political activists, police said.
They blamed the clash on factions of Jatiyatabadi Chhatra Dal (JCD), student wing of the main opposition Bangladesh Nationalist Party.
Arif Hossain, a JCD leader, was killed in a gunbattle with rivals at the university on Thursday. University officials said Saturday's shooting could be a sequel to earlier fighting.
"Three people, believed to be students, have been brought to the emergency unit here with bullet wounds," one doctor at the Dhaka Medical College Hospital said.
The Dhaka University has been the scene of frequent political violence that has claimed the lives of at least 20 students in the past decade, police said.
